content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. How much are you willing to pay for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: As I said, I am looking for the lowest price possible. The apartment is nice and in a good location, but I am a student so money is tight. How about 300 euros per month?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Max, but 300 euros is far below my asking price for such a centrally located, brand new apartment. I'm looking for a more reasonable offer. How about 500 euros per month? It's a fair price considering the amenities and the location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is still too high for me. I understand that the apartment is nice and has a good location, but I am a student and I have to save money. How about 400 euros per month?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I appreciate your budget constraints as a student, but 400 euros is still not acceptable for this apartment. The market value for similar properties in the city center is much higher. Let's meet in the middle. How about 450 euros per month? It's a fair compromise.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 425 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Max, but 425 euros is still not enough for this apartment. I'm looking for a tenant who values the quality and location of this property and is willing to pay a fair price. If you're not willing to pay 450 euros per month, I'd rather keep looking for a tenant who appreciates the investment I've made in this property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the landlord is not willing to meet my price.
[[/closed]]
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your position, Max. If you're not willing to pay 450 euros per month, then we won't be able to reach an agreement. I wish you the best of luck in finding an apartment that meets your budget. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
